H0.text: who is considered as architect of india constitution. Jawaharlal Nehru

H1.text: who is considered as architect of india constitution. Mahatma Gandhi

H2.text: who is considered as architect of india constitution. Vallabhbhai Patel

H3.text: who is considered as architect of india constitution. B.R. Ambedkar

A4.text: Ambedkar chaired the committee that drafted the Constitution of India based on the debates of the Constituent Assembly of India and the first draft of Sir Benegal Narsing Rau.

A5.text: Ambedkar served as Law and Justice minister in the first cabinet of Jawaharlal Nehru.
